act_info.full_title: Interim Appropriation for 2018-2019 Act, 2017, S.O. 2017, c. 34, Sched. 22

content.content:
1 Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act
unless the context requires otherwise.
content.raw_html: 1 Expressions used in this Act have the same meaning as in the Financial Administration Act unless the context requires otherwise.

content.content: 2 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019, amounts not exceeding a total of $138,769,721,600 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 2 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019, amounts not exceeding a total of $138,769,721,600 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash expenses to be applied to the expenses of the public service that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 3 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019, amounts not exceeding a total of $5,759,932,500 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 3 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019, amounts not exceeding a total of $5,759,932,500 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund or recognized as non-cash investments to be applied to the investments of the public service in capital assets, loans and other investments that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 4 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019, amounts not exceeding a total of $251,845,200 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.
content.raw_html: 4 Pending the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019, amounts not exceeding a total of $251,845,200 may be paid out of the Consolidated Revenue Fund to be applied to the expenses of the Legislative Offices that are not otherwise provided for.

content.content: 5 All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019. 6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act). 7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act). ______________  Français
content.raw_html:
5 All expenditures made or recognized under this Act must be charged to the proper appropriation following the voting of supply for the fiscal year ending on March 31, 2019.

6 Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Act).

7 Omitted (enacts short title of this Act).

______________
